markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thorough Reports](/Feats.aspx?ID=874) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

</column>

---

Your reports are thorough and informative, and putting your thoughts to paper helps you retain the information. Keep track of each type of creature you successfully identify with [Recall Knowledge](/Skills.aspx?General=true&ID=5). When attempting [Recall Knowledge](/Skills.aspx?General=true&ID=5) checks against creatures on your list in later encounters, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus, and you learn an additional fact about such creatures on a success.

<title level="2">Thorough Reports leads to...</title>
[Discerning Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2274)
name: Thorough Reports
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 23 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Recalling Knowledge adds creatures to your list, granting you bonuses to Recall in future encounters.
</summary>
summary: Recalling Knowledge adds creatures to your list, granting you bonuses to Recall in future encounters.
